div.p: Psansnos the elder son of Petroszmethis has paid eight dr. [on account] for the poll tax of the first [year] of Nerva Caesar, [the lord], on 13th Pachon. [I, Hermogenes, tax collector,] have written. Psansnos himself (has paid) [the remaining] for the 1st year nine dr. the total 9 dr. [I, Hermogenes, tax collector,] have written. Translation: S.A. Aly, ZPE 219 (2021) 152
